title: ZeeshanTrade
author: ZeeshanTrade
content: In my little time on this forum , i came to know that WO does not show signatures. By the way, i do not know the reason for this.Is there any other section of the forum which do not show Signatures ?

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: ZeeshanTrade on September 15, 2023, 03:50:02 PMIn my little time on this forum , i came to know that WO does not show signatures. By the way, i do not know the reason for this.It was removed many months ago because it was demanded for to be removed. Quote from: ZeeshanTrade on September 15, 2023, 03:50:02 PMIs there any other section of the forum which do not show Signatures ?Serious discussion and Ivory tower are not showing signature.

comments.author: tbct_mt2
comments.created_time: September 15, 2023, 03:57:55 PMLast edit: September 15, 2023, 04:13:25 PM by tbct_mt2
comments.body: Quote from: ZeeshanTrade on September 15, 2023, 03:50:02 PMIn my little time on this forum , i came to know that WO does not show signatures. By the way, i do not know the reason for this.Spam and get posts for their payment in signature campaigns. theymos disabled signatures to stop it.Wall Observer new ownership. Ownership changed because of that topic became problematic.What to do with the wall observer thread?QuoteIs there any other section of the forum which do not show Signatures ?Two more boards.Two new no-signature boardsRules for Serious Discussion and Ivory Tower

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: ZeeshanTrade on September 15, 2023, 03:50:02 PMIn my little time on this forum , i came to know that WO does not show signatures. By the way, i do not know the reason for this.It became safe haven for signature campaign spammers both bounty and bitcoin paying campaign. And there's a request[1] to disabled merit on such board too.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5464370.0

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: ZeeshanTrade on September 15, 2023, 03:50:02 PMIn my little time on this forum , i came to know that WO does not show signatures. By the way, i do not know the reason for this.Is there any other section of the forum which do not show Signatures ?Yeah, the signatures are disabled on WO thread and other then WO I have seen it disable on Serious discussion board. The signatures are also disabled on a sub board that's Ivory Tower and other than those I haven't personally found any other thread or board where signatures were disabled.
